Holds up in 2021. Not gonna talk about how good the game is since it's already been done to death. 

Source Engine still runs fine as of 2022 so there's no need to install mods or patches in order to play this game. You also get dev commentary which is nice.
i quite enjoyed this game, it was a pleasant experience. Recommended for all ages.

Что первая Халфа со своими аддонами, что вторая Халфа со своими эпизодами просто замечательные для своего времени. На данный момент вторая часть Халфы не смотря на свой солидный возраст играется бодро и вызывает большой интерес.  Разработчики пытались не повторятся  и всяческий хотели разнообразить игру с различными локациями, что у них и удалось. 
Если не знаешь не сюжета и ничего, то от этой игры как и всей серии в целом можно пропасть на долгие часы с увлекательным гемплеем.Игре я ставлю 10 из 10 для 2004 года это шедевр.

Some questionable things, but i an give an explanation
ok so first off, I LOVE THIS GAME, Among us is a game of teamwork and betrayal, it has a cartoony artstyle that is appealing to kids, but here are the stuff you might wanna know,
1. There is an in game chat which allows you to talk to players, if you dont have discord that is, some dangerous info can be passed down, but as innersloth said, "stick to the private lobbies". Also, you can censor the chat's bad words, so dont worry, it all good, just talk to your child about online safety,
2. Among us is a murder mystery game, meaning there is a murderer on board that tries to kill the entire crew, when the imposter attacks, a little bit of blood is shown on the screen, (no splatters, just a tiny bit of blood as an effect) on the crewmate who got killed's view, there is a brutal animation where the imposter stabs, shoots, impales, or simply snaps the players neck, these animations are a little violent but it wont do anything to a child, also, no blood is shown in these animations.
3. You can find dead bodies where the imposter killed the crewmember, if you find these, you will be put into a meeting which uses the ingame chat to talk about who the imposter is, you can also call a meeting if you see the imposter hop into a vent,
4.The game allows you to buy some ingame cosmetics, which are 3.00 dollars each, but you get a whole lot of cosmetics without buying anything, soooooooooooooo yeah your child wont ask for your credit card,
5. i recommend getting among us on steam for your child, as the mobile version (which is free) can contain some very inappropriate ads,


soooooooooooo, did i make a good explanation?
media vida 2 - el regreso del gordo hombre libre
Та игра, для которой не нужны никакие обзоры. Живая легенда, которую я перепрохожу по нескольку раз в год.

I want you to put yourself in the shoes of someone who has been asleep in a coma for 2 whole decades. Think about all the time you've lost, how much your loved ones have changed and maybe even how quickly they've forgotten about you. Now imagine that during your time before your slumber, you did something. Something terrible and despicable that cost the lives of billions. That destroyed your world and practically wiped out most of your species. That is Half-Life 2. Contrary to the badass and extremely fast-pased Half-Life 1, Half-Life 2 is a more dark, sincere and brutal story. An interdimensional empire hellbent on control of all sentient life. You look into them more and more and discover their vast and incomprehensible gasp on reality. You think of all the pain, torment and suffering they've caused you, your loved ones and your species and finally you discover that your rebellion is basically the same as a fly landing on the Combine's shoulder. It means nothing. No matter what you do, who you kill or what happened before, you have to learn to accept that your entire species is over no matter what. You learn that the Combine won the second you placed that Xenian crystal into that machine. You caused this. Now live with it.
